overview:
Spire.io provides a set of hosted, secure, and scalable APIs for mobile and web application development.

Spire.io was founded around the vision of a new platform for “server-less” applications. This new type of development platform off-loads the complex and expensive server-side engineering to Spire.io’s hosted service. This frees developers to focus on optimizing features rather than infrastructure.

With Spire.io, any developer can easily add secure, scalable, and optimized back-end functionality to any application in minutes. Spire.io helps developers save weeks of engineering time, reducing initial build costs and time-to-market. Once launched, applications benefit from an elastic architecture, reducing the risk of down-time and performance issues.

Developers can count on Spire.io as a premium one-stop destination for server-side solutions thanks to their unified APIs, which ensure easy integration and low technical risk.
